name: NickyBee's Adventure
description:
This is a submission for a contest hosted by the streamer NickyBoi and might not be developed any further unless there is more potential upon future revaluation. 

Controls:

  • Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move
  • Press Space to shoot notes and gain points
  • Collect the Bee'Maws to gain 5 additional points

NickyBoi on Twitch:  https://www.twitch.tv/nickyboi

Music and sound effects from https://freesound.org

  • https://freesound.org/people/Mrthenoronha/sounds/518737/
  • https://freesound.org/people/joshuaempyre/sounds/251461/
